name: places/ChIJkf5-kKf2wokR1CGjyoVYBt4
formattedAddress: 605 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10040, USA
adrFormatAddress: 605 Fort Washington Ave, New York, NY 10040-3902, USA

originalText.text: Amazing dry cleaners.  Super friendly.  Have been a customer for over 20 years.  Highly recommend.  Jessica rocks!!

text.text: Amazing dry cleaners.  Super friendly.  Have been a customer for over 20 years.  Highly recommend.  Jessica rocks!!

originalText.text: Picked up my husband's shirt and the collar tips were black and burnt. The lady was not only nasty about it, saying I brought it in that way, but she accused me of setting her up - that I deliberately brought the shirt dirty and now I'm trying to squeeze her for cash. The most disgusting customer service I have ever experienced and will never be going back there. The best part is she told me that if I was a regular customer she would defend me, but since I don't go often enough she knows I set her up. Truly a disgusting human being.

text.text: Picked up my husband's shirt and the collar tips were black and burnt. The lady was not only nasty about it, saying I brought it in that way, but she accused me of setting her up - that I deliberately brought the shirt dirty and now I'm trying to squeeze her for cash. The most disgusting customer service I have ever experienced and will never be going back there. The best part is she told me that if I was a regular customer she would defend me, but since I don't go often enough she knows I set her up. Truly a disgusting human being.

originalText.text:
They are frequently late on their alterations -- you can go in and the smiling lady will tell you "oh sorry can you come back tomorrow". And when they get an order wrong -- which they did -- they make excuses. They got the order wrong on my dress hem and all I got from her --the smiling lady -- was a "sorry."
They once got some grease on a pair of pants of mine and she insisted that I "brought them in that way" and I stopped going there for a good 3 years. I finally gave them another try two years ago, only to be disappointed again. While this area cleaners was slightly less expensive than others, I guess in the end you get what you pay for.

originalText.text:
CLOSED as Monarch, but owner Jessica is NOW OPERATING VIP CLEANERS in partnership with VIP's previous owner! VIP is just the other side of Kismat next door, which is around the corner at 803 W 187th St, where VIP Cleaners still is. See VIP Cleaners there for more information.

We've known Jessica for 10 years only by patronizing Monarch. We've had EXCELLENT service throughout that time. She not only does alterations, but as one example of excellence, when my wife wants to do her own alteration, Jessica lends her a spool of thread and let's her take however much she needs. She has gone far beyond what is required many times over the years.

originalText.text: Extremely kind and fair place with some of the best prices I’ve seen. They reliably do a good job on complex alterations, repairs, and cleaning.

text.text: Extremely kind and fair place with some of the best prices I’ve seen. They reliably do a good job on complex alterations, repairs, and cleaning.
